title: STAT+: Federal appeals court upholds ruling blocking NIH cap on research overhead payments
description: Federal appeals court judges upheld a lower court’s ruling preventing the NIH from cutting billions of dollars in support for research overhead.
content: Federal appeals court judges upheld a lower court’s ruling preventing the NIH from cutting billions of dollars in support for research overhead.
